repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.unittitle: Jesse C. Adkins et al. vs Children's Hospital of the District of Columbia Court Records
did.abstract: Brief for Apellees, presented before the Court of Appeals of the District of Columbia in the case of the Children's Hospital of the District of Columbia vs. Jessie Adkins, Ethel M. Smith, Joseph Berberick, constituting the Minimum Wage Board of the District of Columbia.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Jessie Adkins, Ethel M. Smith, and Joseph Berberick served on the Minimum Wage Board of the District of Columbia.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a single Brief for Apellees, presented before the Court of Appeals of the District of Columbia in the case of the Children's Hospital of the District of Columbia vs. Jessie Adkins, Ethel M. Smith, Joseph Berberick, constituting the Minimum Wage Board of the District of Columbia.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Jesse C. Adkins et al. vs. Children's Hospital of the District of Columbia Court Records #5357. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
